content: summer is for days in the sun and road trips with the top down enjoy it all with your hair tied back with this beautiful lace hair kerchief going to a festival this summer channel a vintage vibe with this crochet head kerchief it s a quick finish project too and only takes one ball of yarn you can purchase the ad-free pdf here but if you d like this pattern for free visit my website http //bananamoonstudio com/2021/04/30/marietta-kerchief-lacy-crochet-kerchief-pattern/ get two free pattern downloads when you subscribe to my newsletter https //bananamoonstudio com/newsletter-sign-up always find my latest free patterns tutorials and reviews at https //bananamoonstudio com happy crocheting april
